title: Can we fix matchmaking?
body:
Please? I'm watching [this game](https://i.imgur.com/b4iTlCh.jpg) now. 

How in the heck are the Akali and Zed in this game with masters/challengers?

Zed has been diamond 5 three seasons in a row, and now has a 50% winrate and is in platinum 2.
Akali has a 45% winrate and is somehow diamond 4, even though they were platinum last season.

Both hardly master/challenger level. And worse than that, they are on the same team! Like, cmon.

replies.body:
It has been addressed in a recent[ dev post](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2019/03/dev-state-of-ranked/), they know they screwed it up and they are looking to do a slight shuffle in diamond+ to try and get things back to how they should be. 

>We’ve also seen numerous matchmaking issues affecting players in Diamond and above. Some of this is expected since we rebalanced the top tiers and expanded the size of Master, as I noted in our previous update, but there are some legitimate issues we need to fix as well.

If they don't reset MMR back to the start of the season, their slight shuffle is not going to change much. The damage has been done. It's going to take a while for monkeys to settle to their proper levels, considering that games are coinflippy and monkeys sometimes get carried during this period.
oh so we get our time wasted and Riot just says deal with it? or do we get some shit for this screw up?
Can we talk about the fact that two people didn't ban anyone when 20+ champs are braindead cancer
